title.rendered: Get Windows 10 Edition for free – SamaGame

content.rendered:
Last chance to get Minecraft: Windows 10 Edition for free

This message is primarily intended for players who own Minecraft: Java Edition. Anyone who purchased this version of the game before October 19, 2018 still has the option to claim their free copy Minecraft: Windows 10 Edition.

This is the last day that a copy of the game will be available for free.

To everyone who bought Minecraft: Java Edition Before October 19, 2018, you are entitled to a free copy windows 10. The offer officially ends on Monday and it is not possible to win the title for free.

However, the informative post itself does not provide detailed instructions on how to do it and after logging into the official Minecraft website there is no option anywhere that would allow us to get the game.

The issue was quickly fixed by a Reddit user using the nickname OMGITSJAD. To get the copy we are authorized Minecraft: Windows 10 editionwe don’t have to log in to the official website of the game, but on Mojang account. Then you can claim the title under the list of our games.

After April 20th, the only way to get a copy of Minecraft: Windows 10 Edition is through the Store.

  • Official site for Minecraft
  • Post informs about the offer
